divs: sighting detailswe're witnessing some incredible things down here in austin. sunday, 2\10, in particular revealed almost a dozen "ships" at dusk -- including a fiery head-on collison between a couple of the ships about 20��� east of the moon at around 7pm -- and after a huge yellow flash the larger of the two ships continued on its north east path as if it had "absorbed" the other ship. also, that same evening, we witnessed a spectacular fly-over that shut my video camera down. last friday, 2\8, we saw one of the ships make an abrupt north to south turnaround, showing what appeared to be several windows and at least one "winged" craft riding on its back -- almost like an aircraft carrier. we also saw a craft appear to completely combust only to return to its regular red, blue and white state as if nothing had happened. it's extremely difficult to image these objects as they skirt the roofs of houses and are almost always obscured by trees -- but i've included several photographs for your inspection. the 2\10 triangle was taken around 8pm in the western sky. the triangle.2.212 was also imaged in the western sky at around 7:40pm. notice the tandem orbs at the bottom left which mark, in my opinion, the nose of the triangle, at least in this picture, though it's my belief the "nose" can change positions in a nano-second -- as well as the entire orientation of the "triangle". i believe the majority of these ships are composed of three hexagonal orbs, each possessing six secondary orbs -- allowing the ships to take on many forms from a single ball of light to a huge, brilliantly illuminated "aircraft-like" object. i used photoshop's "colored pencil" effect to bring out the light wave connections between orbs in the image, ufo.212.warp. i never believed in ufos until they literally got in my face. i may not know what they are but i know they're here.
